references.paper_title: An analysis of approximations for maximizing submodular set functions i
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of submodular optimization, providing the greedy algorithm approximation guarantee.

references.paper_title: Fully dynamic algorithm for constrained submodular optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces the first dynamic algorithm for submodular maximization with polylogarithmic update time.

references.paper_title: Dynamic algorithms for matroid submodular maximization
references.reason: This paper provides a 1/2 approximation for dynamic monotone submodular maximization under matroid constraints.

references.paper_title: On the complexity of dynamic submodular maximization
references.reason: This paper establishes lower bounds on the approximation guarantee achievable by dynamic submodular maximization algorithms.

references.paper_title: The predicted-deletion dynamic model: Taking advantage of ml predictions, for free
references.reason: This paper considers a model for dynamic submodular maximization that incorporates predictions, achieving improved approximation guarantees.
